website_summaries.verdict: The Dell XPS 27 Touch All-in-One (2720) all-in-one desktop updates the best Windows 8 PC around with Intel's latest hardware, and comes up a winner.
pros: Solid performance, thanks to fourth-generation Intel CPU and the latest Nvidia graphics
Thunderbolt port for speedy storage and displays
Has a full-year McAfee Security and premium service warranty

customer_reviews.title: Good until it failed after 20 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Until it failed after only 20 months, this was an excellent computer with lots of capacity for multitasking, a crisp display and better than average speed. In October 2016, the video board failed resulting in vertical lines filling the monitor. I took it to a computer repair shop, which diagnosed it as a catastrophic failure of part of the mother board. The technician believed that the cooling system failed first, resulting in overheating.
customer_reviews.author: Coolmaker

customer_reviews.title: Dell Support Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy Dell unless you want frustration. I have a $1800.00 boat anchor. Last October I received my new Dell XPS 127 (27 inch screen all in one) and in February the Windows 8 crashed. I called for help and learned that software support is for 30 days and I could purchase contract support for help. I declined and then found on line that I could order recovery software for free from Dell. I did this and have found that I could not get Windows 8.1 to reinstall. Again I called for help and was told for a price I could get help. Techs have since hung up on me three times.
customer_reviews.author: Eldon A Gee

customer_reviews.title: Dell EXS XPSo27T-3575BLK 27-inch touchscreen pc
customer_reviews.text: So far I ave been very pleased with the Dell XPS XPSo27T-3575BLK 27-inch touchscreen pc. I also have a Mac and an iPad. I like the touch screen and the windows 8.1 operating system seems much easier than my previous experience with windows operating systems years ago. While still not as easy or intuitive as the MAC the touch screen is easy to use and is vivid in colors and contract. I use it for programs that aren't available for the MAC but find myself using it more and more primarily due to touchscreen.
customer_reviews.author: B Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Love so far :)
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me as a gift and I am happy! It works great and is nice to have it all inclusive so I don't have a huge tower to deal with. I don't use the touch screen as I have a 2 year old who loves to touch everything and wouldn't stop messing with my pc when I was using it so I had my husband turn off the touchscreen feature.
customer_reviews.author: DDerr

customer_reviews.title: We were disappointed with this computer The buttons switching from computer to ...
customer_reviews.text: We were disappointed with this computer The buttons switching from computer to tv did not work initially. After two in-person service calls and replacement of motherboard and screen that issue was resolved but three others popped up. Seriously long hours on the phone for a couple of days with the service center finally resulted in the computer being repaired. At one point we asked to return the computer but with perseverance all issues were finally resolved and the computer is working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Newilumoph

customer_reviews.title: in excellent condition. However
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very fast, in excellent condition. However, had an update issue with windows 8.0 to 8.1...blue please wait screen freeze. Did a reset which fixed that and made setting changes as advised online by others and it's been great since. Haven't had a ton of time with the machine itself but so far it's very fast, the toxin screen is spot on, and has handled my work load very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Heinz

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to say much else. I don't use the touch screen and even forget it is there, but no matter, because the display is bright and crisp. This machine performs well, the included wireless keyboard and mouse and nice. I skipped using a wired network connection since it sits right next to my wireless router. It really just plugs into the wall and works. Even my speakers are bluetooth so no wires there either. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Best iMac Alternative Available
customer_reviews.text: If you want to get the most out of Windows 8, you really need one of these AIO touchscreen PCs. I bought one for the office and one for the bedroom which double as TVs since there is an HDHomeRun Prime on the network. The QHD touchscreen is 10-point and fun to use. My only complaint with this model was the SSD was only 32 GB which doesn't leave any breathing room for apps after you've installed Windows. The good news is that these models are extremely serviceable. I was able to add two 256 GB mSATA SSD drives in under 30 minutes. Can't believe I'm giving praise to a DELL product, but they really got this one right.
customer_reviews.author: RTM135

customer_reviews.title: I really like the big screen
customer_reviews.text: I really like the big screen, everything is very clear so far so good, I've only had it for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen stopped working after a month or so. ...
customer_reviews.text: Touch screen stopped working after a month or so. Constantly disconnected with wireless. Never had so many issues with a computer.
customer_reviews.author: David D. Shealor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this computer Use for editing photos in Lightroom and Photoshop C C Color calibrated...screen size really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Clete W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic computer. Dealfisher is an excellent company to do business with. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L. Allmer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific all-in-one PC!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Dell XPS 27" to replace a similar, but older HP all-in-one PC for my wife. The display on this Dell is truly exceptional. My wife loves how crisp her photos look, which is a glowing endorsement from her. The Dell runs relatively fast, although I would have preferred a full SSD drive versus the combo HD/SSD drive. The keyboard and mouse are not the highest quality, but they work fine. Really the shining star here is the great 1440p 27" touchscreen. Colors are nicely saturated and the graphics are tack sharp. This PC should last us a good 7 years before we need to upgrade again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yun

customer_reviews.title: Dell XPS all in one desktop
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful screen. I did have a major problem with unwanted popup programs right out of the box. Mostly registry scan programs which it switched to on its own. Several were installed, maybe from malware? After I went to the control panel and deleted any programs that were listed that were showing up, it has behaved much better. Any other purchasers have similar problems?
customer_reviews.author: John E. Downing

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I hoped. It was an older model, but new in box, which was about $700 less than the new version of the same computer.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great PC for what it is. I think the resolution and feature set is unbeatable for this price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Petriv

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has been working great so far! I'm very happy with this system.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Kendrigan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: good price, good computer, we have little ones in the house and even the 2 year old can manage the touchscreen. We love it....
customer_reviews.author: Grandmary

customer_reviews.title: Love not have any
customer_reviews.text: Fast and everything works well. Love not have any bloatware
customer_reviews.author: Ken Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Dell for great deal
customer_reviews.text: This all-in-one computer performs even better than expected. I waited and waited to make the purchasing hoping to find something faster and cheaper, but in the end this was a great deal and great PC from Dell.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Mutart

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: WIRELESS KEYBOARD AND MOUSE RESPONSE TIME AND OPERATION REALLY BAD. OTHERWISE UNIT IS OK.
customer_reviews.author: Kent A.

customer_reviews.title: Microphone on PC was dead when received it. Call ...
customer_reviews.text: Microphone on PC was dead when received it. Call Dell technician brought in the part to replace then caused PC totally junk. I had to return to buy another one. Not reliable PC
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: It's certainly better than the relic I replaced
customer_reviews.text: It's really too early to say. Every time it updates it shuts off and won't automatically re-boot. If I use a screen saver it often freezes overnight. That can be aggravating! It's certainly better than the relic I replaced!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M Boffa

customer_reviews.title: A solid all-in-one PC
customer_reviews.text: This Dell XPS is a solid all-in-one PC that has robust features such as HDMI and Thunderbolt connectivity, as well as a high resolution display that will make for a vivid experience when viewing photos, watching movies or playing standard games. If you are looking for fuller features would recommend checking out this Dell to compare:
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

product_meta.title: Dell XPS XPSo27T-3575BLK 27-Inch Touchscreen All-in-One Desktop (3.1 GHz Intel Core i7-4770s Processor, 8GB DDR3, 2TB HDD, 32GB SSD, Windows 8) Black (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Bright ideas look even better on the Quad HD panel of the new XPS 27 All-in-One, featuring 4th Gen Intel Core processors and Windows 8. Item includes 32GB caching drive, but it is not partitioned in a way that makes it user accessible for storing files and/or programs. If you do a Windows search for “Disk Management”, they will be able to pull up the disk partition menu and validate that the drive is present.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: 2 TB 7200 rpm Hard Drive, 32 GB Solid-State Drive

specifications.Graphics Coprocessor: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M 2GB DDR5 with TPM V1.2
